post:
![](https://i.imgur.com/dluOO6u.png)

Hello LET'ers,

Hope you’re all doing well. It’s been some time since we brought this amazing community some insane CloudCone deals, and we are back TODAY for the 11.11 Sale. 

We got 2 rare deals and these start at a sweet spot of USD 11 dollars and 11 cents per year. ($11.11/year) Choose your favorite deal from below and deploy fast to secure it. Limited stocks.

A small intro about the company, CloudCone, LLC is a Cloud Hosting Services Provider that provides Managed hourly services, AnyCast DNS, Private Clouds powered by OnApp, and high-performance bare metal dedicated servers as our primary services. We offer an unmatched stack of cloud services that collaborate to provide a scalable infrastructure for your online presence.

Together with an international team of in-house Support and DevOps Engineers, we provide 24/7 Support via tickets for all our clients. As always, we listen to all the feedback provided and continuously attempt to improve our services to match our overall customer demands better.

----------
Recently we launched a new service category called ‘[Virtual Private Servers (VPS)](https://cloudcone.com/vps/)’ and we have rebranded the usual offerings as Scalable Cloud Compute (SC2). Here’s a detailed comparison between the two services: [https://cloudcone.com/cloud-servers-and-vps/](https://cloudcone.com/cloud-servers-and-vps/)

The below deals fall under the VPS category.

We maintain an in-house built control and billing platform for end-users with a user-friendly UI that includes some robust features.
 
 - Deploy Virtual machines
 - [Boot/Reboot/Shutdown VMs](https://help.cloudcone.com/en-us/article/vp4emj/)
 - [OS re-installation](https://help.cloudcone.com/en-us/article/16mho9i/)
 - VNC
 - SSH Keys
 - [Resetting root passwords](https://help.cloudcone.com/en-us/article/rg361g/)
 - rDNS update
 - Free AnyCast DNS management (up to 3 domains)

----------
Today's offers are:

**11.11. VPS Offer 1**
--------------------

1 vCPU Core
1 GB Dedicated RAM
40 GB RAID-10 Drive
SSD Cached Storage
2 TB Bandwidth at 1Gbps
1 IPv4 address
Upgradable During Order
Instantly Deployed
Full Root Access
Los Angeles, US
Virtualization: KVM
Category: VPS

$11.11/Year


Order VPS: [https://app.cloudcone.com/vps/10/create?token=11.11-vps-offer-1](https://app.cloudcone.com/vps/10/create?token=11.11-vps-offer-1)

**11.11. VPS Offer 2**
--------------------
2 vCPU Cores
2 GB Dedicated RAM
80 GB RAID-10 Drive
SSD Cached Storage
4 TB Bandwidth at 1Gbps
1 IPv4 address
Upgradable During Order
Instantly Deployed
Full Root Access
Los Angeles, US
Virtualization: KVM
Category: VPS


$21.90/Year

Order VPS: [https://app.cloudcone.com/vps/11/create?token=11.11-vps-offer-2](https://app.cloudcone.com/vps/11/create?token=11.11-vps-offer-2)


NOTE: Add funds to match the relevant plan before deploying.

--------
How to order
--------------------
- [How to add funds to pay?](https://help.cloudcone.com/en-us/article/how-to-add-funds-to-your-account-1n6vknv/) <br>
- [How am i billed for promo plans?](https://help.cloudcone.com/en-us/article/how-billing-works-for-promotional-plans-19bj5lr/) <br>
- [How to manage my server](https://help.cloudcone.com/en-us/category/compute-instances-1jcsxdo/) <br>

Addons
--------------------
- Additional IPv4: $1.00 per month <br>
- IP Changes: $2 Once off

Cloud Support & Care
----------------------------------
A support team of experts, qualified and enthusiastic enough to take on any task are available 24/7. Our Cloud Associates and Cloud Engineers will work one-on-one with you to make sure all your concerns are addressed and they will not rest until your projects are online and running smoothly.

Terms and Conditions
---------------------------------
- Agreeable terms - https://cloudcone.com/policies/ <br>
- Order until stock lasts <br>
- Affiliates: https://cloudcone.com/affiliate/ <br>
- 7 Day money back guarantees, no questions asked. <br>

CloudCone Mobile App
-----------------------------------
Want to experience the true accessibility and convenience of our brand? Make use of our Mobile App’s Instant Support feature to quickly contact our support team anytime, anywhere. Download through the Google Play Store and Apple App Store for free!

Social Media
-------------------------
- [Facebook](http://clco.cc/klop4)<br>
- [Instagram](http://clco.cc/hvd4g) [Check our stories for seasonal bonuses]<br>
- [Twitter](http://clco.cc/gdgb7)<br>
- [Vimeo](http://clco.cc/dXe1r)<br>


CloudCone Network Spec
--------------------
- Locations: Los Angeles, USA (MultaCom DC) <br>
- Looking Glass: http://la.lg.cloudc.one <br>
- Status Page: https://status.cloudcone.com/ <br>

**Node Spec**<br>

2 x Intel Xeon E5 CPUs or Dual Silver CPUs
RAID 10 Drives 
10 Gbit NIC Cards 
Connected via Cisco Nexus 10G switches (FEX) on owned hardware/racks
For any questions feel free to reply to this thread and I'll be more than happy to answer them.

Thanks, 
CloudCone, LLC 
Since 2012
